about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey through the cosmos with Galaxicus, a revival of the classic space MMO "Mega Wars." Rediscover the thrill of strategic space conquest, now revitalized in stunning 3D with the power of Unity. Command your ship, conquer planets, and forge alliances in this ever-changing galaxy.

About This Game:

Master Resource Management:
Efficiently manage the economies of your conquered planets. Optimize resource production and allocation to fuel your expansion. Balance your economy, upgrade your technology, and maintain your ship to stay ahead in the race for galactic dominance. Resource management is the core gameplay loop, requiring careful planning and strategic decision-making.

Explore a Randomly Generated Galaxy:
Each new WAR cycle brings a fresh, randomly generated galaxy to explore and conquer. No two WARS are the same, providing endless replayability and new strategic challenges.

Conquer and Colonize:
Seize control of planets and turn them into thriving colonies. Fortify your holdings, build production facilities, and prepare for enemy invasions.

Form Alliances and Strategize:
Forge alliances with other players to strengthen your position. Trade resources, coordinate strategies, and work together to achieve common goals. Diplomacy and collaboration are key to surviving and thriving in the universe of Galaxicus. A fleet consists of a group of players working together as a team.

Engage in Epic Space Battles:
Lead your ship into intense, strategic battles against rival players.

Compete in WARS:
Engage in cyclical WARS, where each cycle represents a race to scout, colonize, and defend planets. Each WAR runs for a determined time and concludes with players earning various titles based on their performance. These titles carry over between WARS, adding a layer of prestige and continuity to your achievements.

Experience Retro Gameplay with Modern Enhancements:
Relive the classic gameplay that made "Mega Wars" a legend, now with enhanced graphics, smoother performance, and modernized controls. Galaxicus retains the charm of the original while offering a fresh experience for both veteran players and newcomers.

  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
